item.title: Template-Based Content ODP Instantiation
item.description: Weekly paper discussion - Summary The paper 1 discusses two different ways to use CODPs when developing ontologies. Advantages and disadvantages of both possibilities are presented and substantiated by personal experience of the authors in the context of three ontology engineering projects (VALCRI, IMSK, E-care@home) and a preliminary study (with 5 participants) designed to...

item.title: Test markdown
item.description: Each post also has a subtitle - You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage.
